name: You are the Thicc Laser
description:
Welcome player. Don't fear death, because when you die you'll have more health than what you had previously. You'd be expecting a simple bullet gun right? Well have fun with a laser that will obliterate anything including yourself. You can't have the laser hitting the enemies because it will only electricute you. We're going to have to figure out how to eliminate them through other means. Just keep shooting the laser and we should be able to make it to the next round..

[Come back later for a devlog that will be posted here :) ]

Controls WASDMovementArrow Keys
Control Laser
DashSpace Credits SkyanSam (Code / Level Design) Lightspeed6 (Music) Attributions

Wowie Jam Pack - Jonas Tyroller

Shockwave / Explosion SFX - studiomandragore

Modified Gaster Blaster SFX - Toby Fox
